sonet automatic.desc: Multiple digital bit streams can be transferred via optical fiber using a standardized protocol called SONET, or Synchronous Optical Network. This makes driving safer and more connected by enabling features like enhanced in-car entertainment systems, automated driving assistance, and real-time traffic information.
